title: 1988년 McLean 사건
summary: 미국 Alabama, AL 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: McLean. 판결일: 1988-04-26. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Alabama.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: STATE of Alabama v. Kathryn McLEAN
**판결일**: 1988-04-26
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Alabama
**관할**: Alabama, AL

**판사**: Bowen

## 변호인

John T. Kirk, Montgomery, for appellant., Don Siegelman, Atty. Gen., and Martha Gail Ingram, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.

## 인용

- 529 So. 2d 1053

## 판결문 요약


BOWEN, Presiding Judge.
The circuit court granted the defendant’s motion to suppress the results of a chemical test for intoxication in a prosecution for driving under the influence of alcohol because the defendant was arrested for DUI only after she had been taken into custody and given the PEI test.
This case must be affirmed on authority of Hays v. City of Jacksonville, 518 So.2d 892 (Ala.Cr.App.1987).
AFFIRMED.
All Judges concur.
